","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"IssuerGroup","dataType":3,"expression":"
VAR TopNCount = 5
VAR CurrentIssuer = SELECTEDVALUE(Report_Payment_Vs_Due[InvIssuer_InvoiceIssuerCode])
VAR RankedIssuers =
    TOPN(
        TopNCount,
        SUMMARIZE(
            Report_Payment_Vs_Due,
            Report_Payment_Vs_Due[InvIssuer_InvoiceIssuerCode],
            "AvgDelay", [AverageDelayPerInvoice] 
        ),
        [AvgDelay], DESC
    )
VAR IsTopN = 
    CONTAINS(
        RankedIssuers,
        Report_Payment_Vs_Due[InvIssuer_InvoiceIssuerCode], CurrentIssuer
    )
RETURN
    IF(IsTopN, CurrentIssuer, "Others")
